icp.application.classification

Class MatchingPursuitFeatureExtraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • icp.application.classification.MatchingPursuitFeatureExtraction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFeatureExtraction

    public class MatchingPursuitFeatureExtraction
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFeatureExtraction
    Feature extractor using Matching Pursuit algorithm implemented in eegdsp library.
    Author:
    Karel Silhavy
